Intro.paragraph: After years of grueling work, 50 brave emojis decided they were done being repetitively printed and misused on the large "Best Friends Forever" thread.  They decided to leave the texting world and migrated onto the Ethereum blockchain.  A transformation occurred during the migration process that randomly selected traits from over 110 options, making each emoji unique.  This process took the first 50 emojis and minted them into emOG's that live on the Ethereum blockchain as NFT's.  emOG NFT is the original generative pixel are emoji collection on the Ethereum blockchain.  After the first 50 emOG's were sucessfully minted, other emojis want to follow in their foot steps.  emOG NFT will be expanding to multiple different blockchains, each blockchain will have a maximum of 500 emOG's.

Testimonials.text: How many emOG's will be created?
Testimonials.answer: The emOG NFT collection consists of 10,000 emOG's and will have a maximum of 500 emOG's per blockchain.

Testimonials.text: Shop Launch with giveaways!  We are aiming to get the shop launched before the sale so you can bring an emOG anywhere!
For every 400 emOG's minted, we will give 1 away.  The giveaway emOG will be minted or purchased.  Giveaways will take place on Twitter and Discord.
Revamp website to be 100% transparent.  We want everyone to be able to see where and what we donated.  Through NFT's and community, we will make the world a better place.
Rarity tools submission after 1,000 mints.  We do not want our emOG's getting lonely, Santa Clause will be airdropping companions.
Everytime we break our donation goal, the new goal will be 2X what it was prior.  Jump in our Discord and join us to pave the path for emOG NFT.
